snippet.title: Destiny 2: Shadowkeep - Devil's Ruin Exotic Quest
snippet.description:
In Season of Dawn, a legend from the past returns to aid us in our fight against the Cabal. Guardians of the Last City take up arms and stand with him. Feet firmly planted. Taking aim with steel that cuts through the darkness: Devil’s Ruin.

On January 7, Season Pass owners will begin their quest to ensure that every time the Cabal take one step forward, they also take two steps back. 
Join Saint-14, secure the Devil’s Ruin Exotic Sidearm, and light up the Season of Dawn.

Season of Dawn is now available at the Eververse Trading Co. in Destiny 2.

Learn more: 
https://www.bungie.net/7/en/Seasons/SeasonOfDawn"
